Taxable Income

taxable_income.Rd

This taxable_income() function calculates the Taxable Income by subtracting the total relief from the gross emolument.

Usage

taxable_income(gross_salary, total_relief)

Arguments

gross_salary

Numeric. The total earnings before deductions computed by gross_salary().

total_relief

Numeric. The aggregate relief computed by total_relief().

Value

A numeric value representing the taxable income. If deductions exceed gross salary, the result is 0.

Details

Taxable income is the amount of income that will be subject to tax after all allowable deductions and reliefs have been applied. It is a crucial figure for determining the tax liability.

Examples

taxable_income(5000000, 1000000)  # Returns 4000000
#> [1] 4e+06
